labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: you are invisible but appear offline even on your screen (no grey online status dot or typing indicator)
data.expected_result: you are invisible and see the grey online status dot on your profile pic on the userlist (ONLY SHOWS FOR YOU) and the typing indicator on your profile picture
data.short_description: online status dot and typing indicator go away if youre invisible and switch devices
data.steps_to_repro: - go invisible - switch to your phone (or another desktop?) - use Discord on your phone for a few minutes and keep the status as invisible (ie dont change it) - switch back to your computer
